name: Step Up Auth Validate MFA
description: This API is used server-side to validate and verify the 'secondfactorvalidationtoken' created by the any of the Multi-Factor Step-Up Authentication APIs.

Post Params.name: secondfactorvalidationtoken
Post Params.description: The secondfactorvalidation token obtained after having a MFA with the re-authentication API.

Template Params.name: uid
Template Params.description: UID, the unified identifier for the customer account.
